tasks.task: Driving a piece of farm equipment on the way from the shop to a field
subtasks: Sitting in the driver's seat of a farm machine
Starting the engine of the farm equipment
Adjusting the course and speed of the equipment while driving
Navigating around obstacles or terrain while moving through fields

tasks.task: Detaching the planter from the tractor
subtasks: Positioning the planter adjacent to the tractor
Connecting hydraulic lines between the planter and tractor
Unlocking the attachments on the planter to allow detachment
Disconnecting the seed boxes or bins from the planter
Detaching the toolbar and seed openers from the planter
Aligning the coupling system between the planter and tractor
Disconnecting electrical and hydraulic connections
Retracting the planter onto the tractor for transport

tasks.task: Searching for specific tools that may be missing or needed
subtasks: Observing equipment or tools to identify what is missing
Remembering recent usage and location of tools
Locating a shed, toolbox, or other storage area
Opening the storage area to access tools
Searching within the storage area for the required items

tasks.task: Using a hammer to ream out a stuck seed box
subtasks: Accessing the stuck seed box, likely underneath the planter or on the toolbar
Removing any seed or debris that is blocking the box
Using the hammer to tap on the stuck internal parts
Applying pressure or lubrication to facilitate removal
Extracting the seed box from its position

tasks.task: Reattaching the planter to the tractor
subtasks: Aligning the planter with the tractor for attachment
Connecting hydraulic lines and ensuring proper engagement
Attaching the seed boxes or bins back onto the planter
Reconnecting electrical and hydraulic connections
Securing the toolbar and seed openers onto the planter
Ensuring all connections are tight and secure

tasks.task: Attempting to start the planter's motor
subtasks: Turning the key or engaging the start switch
Checking fuel levels and ensuring the fuel line is connected
Checking coolant levels and status of the cooling system
Inspecting the oil level and condition of the engine
Looking for any visible signs of mechanical issues
Starting the motor and monitoring its operation for any problems

tasks.task: Loading the planter with seed for planting
subtasks: Ensuring the proper types and quantities of seed are available
Opening seed bins or boxes and filling the seed hoppers
Verifying that there is even distribution of seed across hoppers
Checking for any bridging or clumping of seed
Closing the seed hoppers and making sure they are secure

tasks.task: Checking the planter's functionality
subtasks: Running the planter's motors and systems to ensure they work
Testing the seed distribution and ensuring proper spacing
Checking the alignment ofrow units and making any necessary adjustments
Verifying that all implements are properly interfaced and operating correctly
